col1: customizable HTML based templates, custom comment tags
col3: internal links and links to .NET framework documentation

col2: caller and callee graphs, dependency graphs, inheritance diagrams, collaboration diagrams

col1: Custom headers, footers, code coloring, and other CSS styles in individual pages.  Project-wide TOC is generated from a user-defined template.
col3: Configurable syntax highlighting/coloring with automatic linking to symbols in declaration, ability to manually link to symbols in discussion, etc.
col4: Provides warnings if tagged parameters do not match code, parsed parameters included in XML output and Doxygen-style tagfile (-D flag in 8.7).  Partial C preprocessor support with -p flag.  Support for #if/#ifdef control over documentation inclusion using the -D and -U command-line flags.

col1: customizable through style sheets and CSS
col2: linked hierarchy and dependency graphs for function calls, variable sets and reads, class inheritance and interface, and file includes and interface, intra-function flow charts
col3: fully cross-linked project-wide, including all hierarchy and dependency graphs, metrics tables, source code snippets, and source files
col4: full semantic analysis of source code, including parameter types, conditional compilation directives, macro expansions

col1: Customisable for all type of comments
col3: all general documentation, references, manual, organigrams, ... Including the binary codes included in the comments.

col1: Extend the generator classes through Perl programming.

col3: source code syntax highlighting, automatic cross-linking to symbol declarations
cross reference to generated documentation, and to php.net function reference

col2: several in sphinx-contrib, e.g. using aafigure, actdiag, Google Chart, or gnuplot
col3: Table of Contents, Index, cross referencing, syntax highlighting with Pygments
col4: custom objects (such as functions and classes)

col2: Class inheritance, call trees, dependencies (impact analysis)
col3: internal links between classes, methods, variables, tables, columns...

col1: full customization for all output formats, templates for MSDN-like output, custom XML comment tags
col2: linked graphical class diagrams, class inheritance tree
col3: internal links and links to .NET framework documentation
internal classes/modules cross-referenced and Ruby source highlighted
